summary: A man is forced to completely change his habits when he decides to move from the country to the city.
cast: Renato Pozzetto|Massimo Serato|Enzo Cannavale|Donna Osterbuhr|Clara Colosimo|Renato D'Amore|Massimo Boldi|Sandra Ambrosini|Dino Cassio|Armando Celso|Franco Diogene|Enzo Garinei|Fabio Guffanti|Daniela Piperno|Massimo Pongolini|Elio Veller|Francesco Visentin|Jimmy il Fenomeno|Bella|Enzo De Toma|Lucia Vasini
director: Directors: Franco Castellano (as Castellano), Giuseppe Moccia (as Pipolo)
title: Il ragazzo di campagna
